EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to SpringOne Platform 2016!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Welcome to SpringOne Platform! <[[http://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=springone-platform-2016]]> We look forward to welcoming you to SpringOne Platform 2016! Please take a few moments to read through the following information to help you prep for the event.
The Agenda & Mobile App Get started now! To add sessions and create your custom event schedule, please sign in <[[https://2016.event.springoneplatform.io/attendease/login]]> with the account details you used to register. Then, while viewing our full conference agenda and room assignments <[[https://2016.event.springoneplatform.io/schedule/2016-08-02]]>, simply click to schedule a session for a given time slot. This allows you to build your personal agenda which you can view anytime on the SpringOne Platform mobile app.
Download the mobile app from iTunes <[[https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/springone-platform-2016/id1127179835?mt=8]]> or Google Play <[[https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.attendease.pivotal.springone2016]]> (or just search for “SpringOne Platform 2016”).
<[[https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.attendease.pivotal.springone2016]]>
Please note that all sessions on-site are first come, first serve regardless of pre-event selection; you aren’t making a seat reservation, just building your personal schedule.
Speaker Survey Raffle - Win a Bebop 2 Drone! Our speakers work hard to bring you amazing talks. Every time you rate a talk you will be entered to win a Bebop 2 Drone <[[https://us.store.parrot.com/en/bebop-2/378-bebop2.html]]> - the more speakers and talks you rate, the better your chance to win! Survey functionality is only available in the mobile app for sessions you have scheduled, once the talk has started. The winner will be announced at lunch on Thursday, and must be present to win.
Monday Evening Ignite Talks Join us at 7:00pm for Ignite Happy Hour in Juniper Ballroom on level 3 followed by Ignite Talks. You'll hear a range of topics from the deliciousness of making frosting to the impact of temporary amnesia. There will also be time for networking and plenty of food and drink. Make sure to bring your badge.
Tuesday Evening Game Night Join us and our sponsors for Game Night on Tuesday at 6:30pm in the Community Hub! For those wanting organized game time fun, look for the signs featuring a variety of gaming options and make new friends.
Wednesday Evening Community Hub Happy Hour What better way to celebrate hump day than doing Happy Hour? Make sure to bring your badges for snacks and drinks.
Thanks to our Sponsors Make sure to check out the amazing sponsors <[[https://springoneplatform.io/sponsors]]> that not only make SpringOne Platform 2016 possible, but are here with technical experts to enrich your experience!
Social Media Follow all events in real-time by using the hashtag #S1P <[[https://twitter.com/hashtag/s1p]]> and following @pivotal <[[https://twitter.com/pivotal]]> & @spring1platform <[[https://twitter.com/spring1platform]]>
Conference Contact Information Should you have any questions, please contact SpringOne Platform Registration Headquarters.
Email: platform@pivotal.io <[[mailto:platform@pivotal.io]]> Phone: (510) 463-6073 Hours: Monday-Friday 8:30am – 5:00pm
Thank you and we look forward to seeing you at the event!
